mapper.select: select hospital, count(*) as sum from hospital_business where operation_time between #{stime} and #{etime} and operation = '特殊医疗待遇申请' group by hospital order by sum desc limit 15 offset #{offset}
select count(*) from (select hospital, count(*) as sum from hospital_business where operation_time between #{stime} and #{etime} and operation = '特殊医疗待遇申请' group by hospital) temp

select year(h.operation_time) as year, p.sex as sex, count(*) as sum from hospital_business h, person p where h.operation = #{0} and h.social_security_card = p.social_security_card group by year, sex order by year
select year(operation_time) as year, area, count(*) as sum from hospital_business where operation = #{0} group by year, area order by year

SELECT count(*) as sum,year(operation_time) as year,year(birthday) as birth FROM hospital_business join person on hospital_business.social_security_card=person.social_security_card where operation = #{0} group by birth,year order by year,birth
select count(*) as sum, year(operation_time) as year, hospital from hospital_business where operation = #{0} group by year, hospital order by year,sum desc
select hospital, count(*) as sum from hospital_business where operation = #{0} and operation_time between #{1} and #{2} group by hospital order by hospital

select temp.hospital as hospital, max(temp.dsum) as maxNum from (select hospital, count(*) as dsum from hospital_business where operation = #{0} and operation_time between #{1} and #{2} group by hospital, operation_time) temp group by hospital order by hospital

select hospital, department, count(*) as sum from hospital_business where operation_time between #{stime} and #{etime} and operation = '特殊医疗待遇申请' group by hospital, department order by sum desc limit 15 offset #{offset}

select count(*) from (select hospital, department, count(*) as sum from hospital_business where operation_time between #{stime} and #{etime} and operation = '特殊医疗待遇申请' group by hospital, department) temp
select hospital, department, count(*) as sum from hospital_business where operation = #{0} and operation_time between #{1} and #{2} group by hospital, department order by hospital

select temp.hospital as hospital, temp.department as department, max(temp.dsum) as maxNum from (select hospital, department, count(*) as dsum from hospital_business where operation = #{0} and operation_time between #{1} and #{2} group by hospital, department, operation_time) temp group by hospital, department order by hospital
select year(operation_time) as year, count(*) as sum, area from hospital_business where operation='特殊医疗待遇申请' group by year, area order by year, area
